paper_metadata.title: Germline BRCA1 and BRCA2 deleterious mutations and variants of unknown clinical significance associated with breast/ovarian cancer: a report from North India
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted BRCA2 variant information including clinical significance, penetrance data, and individual records.

functional_data.summary: Insertion of a single base T modifies the frame to generate two subsequent phenylalanines and formats an early stop codon.

variants.additional_notes: This variant was identified as novel.
key_quotes: The first novel BRCA2 mutation, c.932_933insT, was recognized.

functional_data.summary: 7/16 (44%) of these mutations were VUS, among which 6/7 were missense mutations.

variants.additional_notes: VUS status indicates uncertainty in pathogenicity.
key_quotes: Furthermore, 7/16 (44%) of these mutations were VUS, among which 6/7 were missense mutations.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant BRCA2 variants were extracted successfully.
